Ally Chip
Converts an enemy into an Ally recovery Package that can heal the tower beyond the maximum recovery limit. Ally Recovery Packages are different than regular recovery packages and do not count towards effects like the Galaxy Compressor  module.
Upgrades
Total bits needed is 14470 which takes 71 weeks to obtain
